trans-unit.target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_07410_000010_METEM<tab>She'll make your pulse race while freezing your blood! The voluptuous Vamp Fatale!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07410_000020_METEM<tab>On waves and flames they ride. The deadly duo─the Xtremes!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07410_000040_METEM<tab>The match is decided! Victory goes to the challenger!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07410_000050_METEM<tab>Ruling over all with an iron fist, the grand champion of the Arcadion─the Tyrant!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07410_000070_METEM<tab>The match is decided! Before your very eyes, a new grand champion is born!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07410_000080_METEM<tab>It's the shocking true face of the villainous president! The mighty serpent of yore─the Lindwurm!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07410_000090_METEM<tab>Unbelievable─the champion's done it! The president has been defeated!
